title: Independent; from broadsheet to tabloid
content: I am currently studying for a BA degree in typography and Graphic Communication at the University of Reading, going into my fourth year. As part of this year i am researching my dissertation entitled 'Independent; from broadsheet to tabloid'. Are there any issues you may want to raise relating to technical specs i may have missed?
